description.value:
The worm makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its stinger.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 3d8 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a [[/save dex 19 format=long]] or be swallowed by the worm. A swallowed creature is &Reference[blinded]{blinded} and &Reference[restrained]{restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the worm, and it takes [[/damage 6d6 type=acid average=true]] damage at the start of each of the worm's turns.

If the worm takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the worm must succeed on a [[/save con 21 format=long]] at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall &Reference[prone]{prone} in a space within 10 feet of the worm. If the worm dies, a swallowed creature is no longer &Reference[restrained]{restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting &Reference[prone]{prone}.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/damage 3d6 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage, and the target must make a [[/save con 19 format=long]], taking [[/damage 12d6 type=poison average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Tunneler. The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
